page.title: 18HEALTH
page.content: In Dunmow there are 2 Doctor's Practices,we visited the surgery at Rood-End Dr Rawes helped us with our research.The Doctor's surgery is open mornings and evenings Monday-Friday and on Saturday morning.In emergency the Doctor will make home visits,the 2 Practices share these calls.The District Nurse and Health visitors make rounds to check on new babies,the elderly and infirm.There are 3 Doctors and nurses at the surgery,1 other Doctor is based at Felsted.The Dental Surgery is open each weekday.Doctors and Dentists have treated people on the National Health since 1948.It costs children and O.A.P's nothing for medical and dental treatment.Adults have to pay a prescription charge and pay a contribution out of their wages. If you live outside the town you can get your prescription from the surgery
